1.title: Alaska
1.plot: An exciting adventure that explores some of the most action packed and dangerous activities in Alaska. Take this epic journey as we bring you along on a helicopter drop snowboarding in the Alaskan back country, snowmobiling and dog sledding.

2.title: Dubai
2.plot: Host Pam Glennon brings you on an exciting adventure in the Middle East as she explores the fascinating and mysterious city of Dubai.

3.title: Abu Dhabi
3.plot: Join host Pam Glennon on a thrilling adventure to Abu Dhabi as she explores the thriving city, sets sail to a royal private island and ventures to the desert on an Arabian wildlife safari in order to discover more on the culture of the Middle East.

imdb.plot outline: Extreme Vacations is a luxury adventure travel show that brings you to some of the most fascinating destinations on the planet. Told through eyes of host Pam Glennon, the half hour documentary travel series brings you on an informational and personal journey to understand the stories, cultures, and excitement of places people only dream of vacationing at. See spectacular accommodations and resorts, view incredible sites, and take a walk on the dangerous side as we take on some of the most thrilling and exhilarating activities known to man.
imdb.title: Extreme Vacations
plot: _Extreme Vacations_ (qv) is a luxury adventure travel show that brings you to some of the most fascinating destinations on the planet. Told through eyes of host Pam Glennon, the half hour documentary travel series brings you on an informational and personal journey to understand the stories, cultures, and excitement of places people only dream of vacationing at. See spectacular accommodations and resorts, view incredible sites, and take a walk on the dangerous side as we take on some of the most thrilling and exhilarating activities known to man.::Anonymous
